mission.posting: Yusa has to do something for someone she holds close to her heart.

email.subject: Yusa - Desperation Final
email.body: Thank you for helping me with this. From the last investigation into Kellis, I found out where a working prototype firmware patch for their pacemaker system was. Now the issue is finding out how to access the pacemaker to update the system. Each Kellis Biotech pacemaker comes with an admin override. I want to find this admin override, so I can update my brother's pacemaker system so he can be saved. The first prototype of the patch was uploaded to a man named Eamon Greene's pacemaker. I suggest you look there as a start. When you find them, send them to me as seperate strings. Please help me find this, -Yusa

attachments.note: Help Yusa save her brother. Investigate Kellis Biotech. Find admin username and passwords. Attach them as seperate strings.
